definition: bond (esp. document split in two, with each party holding one half)/contract/deed (i.e. title deeds)/ticket/voucher/certificate

sentences.english: It is impossible that markets are in the same market.
sentences.chinese: 交易所记帐式债券也能在股市里买。

sentences.english: Bond, comes with the war, is my understanding after read this chapter.
sentences.chinese: 债券，随着战争来临时，是我阅读本章后的理解。

sentences.english: In theory, to issue exchangeable bonds on the market is good.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上讲，在市场上发行可转换债券是好的。

sentences.english: These bonds would also be jointly and severally guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 这类欧元债券还将获得多个国家的联合担保。

sentences.english: And in the meantime, they'd pay the banks interest on thosebonds.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，它们也用债券支付银行的利息。

sentences.english: European bond markets continued to creak as buyers remained scarce.
sentences.chinese: 由于买家稀少，欧洲债券市场仍处于勉力维持的境地。

sentences.english: Uncertainty of position characterizes bonds in this class.
sentences.chinese: 地位不确定是这一级债券的特征。

sentences.english: The latest de-listing has increasedspeculation that China's holdings will be adjusted down.
sentences.chinese: 最新的退市增加了中国会下调其所持债券的猜测。

sentences.english: In other words, long-dated bonds offer a lot more income than short ones.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，长期债券的收益要高于短期债券。

sentences.english: In other words, long-dated bonds offer a lot more income than short ones.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，长期债券的收益要高于短期债券。

sentences.english: Zero-coupon securities have little risk, but they do have a few tax disadvantages.
sentences.chinese: 零息债券没有什么风险，但他们确实有少数税务缺点。

sentences.english: An auction of Greek 6-month government debt was also given a lukewarm reception this morning.
sentences.chinese: 希腊今晨拍卖的6个月政府债券也遇冷。

sentences.english: But the composition of that investment is tilting toward government securities.
sentences.chinese: 但这些投资的成分，却正在向政府债券倾斜。

sentences.english: In a market economy, city selection can be accomplished through the bond market.
sentences.chinese: 在市场经济中，城市的选择可以通过债券市场来完成。

sentences.english: But such bond-buying is a temporary palliative.
sentences.chinese: 但这种债券买法治标不治本。
政府债券可靠吧，回报近乎没有。

definition: to underwrite (i.e. guarantee financing)/underwriting/to sell as agent/consignee
